question: At which among the following places, first summit of SAARC had taken place?
explanation: SAARC is regional intergovernmental organization and geopolitical union in South Asia. It promotes development of economical and regional integration.Â  Member Countries: Bangladesh, Bhutan, India, Maldives, Nepal, Pakistan, Sri Lanka and Afghanistan (joined in 2007 The first SAARC summit was held in Dhaka (Bangladesh) in December 1985.
